PROFILE_SETTINGS.TITLE: Pengaturan Profil
PROFILE_SETTINGS.AVATAR_DELETE_FAILED: There is an error while deleting avatar, please try again
PROFILE_SETTINGS.AFTER_EMAIL_CHANGED: Profil Anda telah berhasil diperbarui, silakan masuk lagi dengan data akun yang baru diubah

PROFILE_SECTION.TITLE: Profil
PROFILE_SECTION.NOTE: Alamat email Anda adalah identitas Anda dan digunakan untuk masuk.

SEND_MESSAGE.TITLE: Hotkey to send messages
SEND_MESSAGE.NOTE: You can select a hotkey (either Enter or Cmd/Ctrl+Enter) based on your preference of writing.
SEND_MESSAGE.UPDATE_SUCCESS: Your settings have been updated successfully

ENTER_KEY.HEADING: Enter (↵)
ENTER_KEY.CONTENT: Send messages by pressing Enter key instead of clicking the send button.

CMD_ENTER_KEY.HEADING: Cmd/Ctrl + Enter (⌘ + ↵)
CMD_ENTER_KEY.CONTENT: Send messages by pressing Cmd/Ctrl + enter key instead of clicking the send button.

MESSAGE_SIGNATURE_SECTION.TITLE: Personal message signature
MESSAGE_SIGNATURE_SECTION.NOTE: Create a personal message signature that would be added to all the messages you send from your email inbox. Use the rich content editor to create a highly personalised signature.

MESSAGE_SIGNATURE.LABEL: Message Signature
MESSAGE_SIGNATURE.PLACEHOLDER: Insert your personal message signature here.

PASSWORD_SECTION.TITLE: Kata Sandi
PASSWORD_SECTION.NOTE: Memperbarui kata sandi Anda akan mengatur ulang login Anda di beberapa perangkat.

ACCESS_TOKEN.TITLE: Access Token
ACCESS_TOKEN.NOTE: Token ini dapat digunakan jika Anda sedang membangun integrasi berbasis API

AUDIO_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.TITLE: Pemberitahuan Audio
AUDIO_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.NOTE: Aktifkan notifikasi audio di dasbor untuk pesan dan percakapan baru.

CONDITIONS.TITLE: Alert conditions:
CONDITIONS.CONDITION_ONE: Send audio alerts only if the browser window is not active
CONDITIONS.CONDITION_TWO: Send alerts every 30s until all the assigned conversations are read

EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.TITLE: Notifikasi Email
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.NOTE: Perbarui preferensi pemberitahuan email Anda di sini
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_ASSIGNMENT: Kirim pemberitahuan email saat percakapan ditugaskan kepada saya
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_CREATION: Kirim pemberitahuan email ketika percakapan baru dibuat
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_MENTION: Kirim pemberitahuan email saat Anda disebut dalam percakapan
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.ASSIGNED_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Kirim pemberitahuan email ketika pesan baru dibuat dalam percakapan yang telah ditugaskan
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.PARTICIPATING_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Send email notifications when a new message is created in a participating conversation

API.UPDATE_ERROR: Terjadi kesalahan saat memperbarui preferensi, silahkan coba lagi

PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.TITLE: Push Notifications
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.NOTE: Perbarui preferensi push notification Anda di sini
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_ASSIGNMENT: Kirim pemberitahuan push ketika percakapan ditugaskan kepada saya
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_CREATION: Kirim push notification ketika percakapan baru dibuat
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_MENTION: Kirim push notification ketika Anda disebut dalam percakapan
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.ASSIGNED_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Kirim push notification ketika pesan baru dibuat dalam percakapan yang telah ditugaskan
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.PARTICIPATING_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Send push notifications when a new message is created in a participating conversation
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.HAS_ENABLED_PUSH: Anda telah mengaktifkan push notification untuk browser ini.

NAME.LABEL: Nama lengkap Anda

CURRENT_PASSWORD.LABEL: Kata sandi saat ini

CURRENT_PASSWORD.PLACEHOLDER: Silakan masukkan kata sandi saat ini

PASSWORD.LABEL: New password

PASSWORD_CONFIRMATION.LABEL: Konfirmasi kata sandi baru
PASSWORD_CONFIRMATION.ERROR: Konfirmasi kata sandi harus sama dengan kata sandi

ACCOUNT_SUSPENDED.TITLE: Account Suspended
ACCOUNT_SUSPENDED.MESSAGE: Your account is suspended. Please reach out to the support team for more information.

FILE_BUBBLE.INSTAGRAM_STORY_UNAVAILABLE: This story is no longer available.

SIDEBAR.FACEBOOK_REAUTHORIZE: Koneksi Facebook Anda telah kedaluwarsa, hubungkan kembali halaman Facebook Anda untuk melanjutkan layanan

SET_AUTO_OFFLINE.INFO_TEXT: Let the system automatically mark you offline when you aren't using the app or dashboard.

MANAGE_SUBSCRIPTION.TITLE: Manage your subscription
MANAGE_SUBSCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION: View your previous invoices, edit your billing details, or cancel your subscription.

CHAT_WITH_US.TITLE: Need help?
CHAT_WITH_US.DESCRIPTION: Do you face any issues in billing? We are here to help.

BILLING_SETTINGS.NO_BILLING_USER: Your billing account is being configured. Please refresh the page and try again.

CREATE_ACCOUNT.NO_ACCOUNT_WARNING: Uh oh! We could not find any Chatwoot accounts. Please create a new account to continue.
